description: The CreateLoggingConfiguration operation creates rules and alerting logging configuration for the workspace. Use this operation to set the CloudWatch log group to which the logs will be published to.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Case-sensitive. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: logGroupArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the CloudWatch log group to which the vended log data will be published. This log group must exist prior to calling this operation.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace to create the logging configuration for.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the current rules and alerting logging configuration.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: If failed, the reason for the failure.
